exception.name: ErrorDeregisterClientFailed
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the SE API function deregisterClient fails to disable the invocation of startTransaction, updateTransaction and finishTransaction for the specified clientId.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorDeregisterClientFailed that is thrown if the SE API function deregisterClient fails to disable the invocation of startTransaction, updateTransaction and finishTransaction for the specified clientId.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when client deregistration operation fails
